status_description_okay_sex: Sexual preferences were met but it wasn't the best
happiness_dialog_went_on_date_3: I wonder what your eyes would look like at night..
happiness_dialog_went_on_date_4: I must have gone fishing... because you're the perfect catch
happiness_dialog_adopted_baby_0: It feels so good to finally have a baby.
happiness_dialog_adopted_baby_2: This is the happiest day of my life!
happiness_dialog_adopted_baby_3: I can't wait to raise you little one.
happiness_dialog_did_not_want_baby_0: Damn it! Now I have to take care of a toddler..
happiness_dialog_did_not_want_baby_1: I do not want to take care of a baby for the rest of my life.
happiness_dialog_did_not_want_baby_3: A baby?! Tell me you're joking.
happiness_dialog_okay_sex_0: That was alright, they weren't the best at it.
happiness_dialog_okay_sex_1: Meh, at least it was okay
happiness_dialog_enjoyed_sex_0: I loved that! I would be down to do them again.
happiness_dialog_enjoyed_sex_1: Perfect, just how I like doing it.
happiness_dialog_disliked_sex_0: I did not like any single bit of that.
happiness_dialog_disliked_sex_1: Ugh that was terrible, I regret doing that.
happiness_dialog_cheated_on_0: Why does this always happen to me..?
happiness_dialog_cheated_on_2: What did I do to deserve this?
happiness_dialog_cheated_on_3: Where did it all go wrong?
happiness_dialog_breakup_0: I wish it didn't have to end..
happiness_dialog_breakup_1: At least I wasn't cheated on..
happiness_dialog_breakup_3: I'm sorry that we ended up this way.
happiness_dialog_true_self_0: It feels so good to realize myself.
happiness_dialog_true_self_1: My orientation is the biggest part of what makes me, me.
happiness_dialog_true_self_2: I'm going to own myself and I won't hide it!
happiness_dialog_true_self_3: I wouldn't have it any other way.
happiness_dialog_orientation_fits_0: It's nice that I can talk about my orientation without being berated for it.
happiness_dialog_orientation_fits_1: I'm so happy that I am accepted here.
happiness_dialog_orientation_does_not_fi: Why did I have to be born this way?
Why am I hated for who I am?
happiness_dialog_insulted_for_orientatio: Why should they care who I couple with or date?!
What the hell is wrong with them!
not_same_island: They are not on the same island!
lover_selected: Choose a unit that has a lover
no_lover: This unit does not have a lover!
love_successful: Force lover successful! They will not break up on their own unless you intervene.
ForceLover Description: Force a unit to become lovers with another unit
sex_successful: Force coupling successful! They will attempt to couple as soon as possible. Outer forces may interrupt the deed.
ForceSex Description: Force a unit to commence coupling with another unit
ForceBreakup Description: Force a lover to break up
kiss_successful: Force kiss successful! They will attempt to kiss as soon as possible. Outer forces may interrupt the kiss.
kiss_too_far: Force kiss cancelled! The two units have to be on the same island!
ForceKiss Description: Force a unit to kiss someone
sexualivf_successful: Sexual IVF successful! They will attempt to make a baby via sexual IVF as soon as possible. Outer forces may interrupt this task.
sexualivf_invalid_unit: This unit has no lover or best friend.
sexualivf_invalid_unit_2: This unit is currently pregnant or has no house!
sexualivf_unavailable: This unit's lover and/or best friend is currently unavailable to do sexual IVF! Double check that they are in the same house, can reproduce, and are not pregnant.
ForceSexualIVF Description: Force a lover to make a baby via sexual IVF
date_successful: Date successful! They will attempt to start the date as soon as they can. Outer forces may interrupt this task.
ForceDate Description: Force a lover to go on a date with their lover
trait_sex_indifferent_info: Coupling is not a requirement for them to be in a relationship.
trait_sex_indifferent_info_2: They'd rather love than do the deed!
trait_cheated_info: Cheated on their partner in the past.
trait_cheated_info_2: Whatever happens once may never happen again, but whatever happens twice is bound to happen a third time
trait_committed_incest_info: Had a romance with their family member.
trait_aromantic_info: They do not desire love unlike most
trait_aromantic_info_2: It's not because they have not found the right person, they just feel this way
trait_homoromantic_info: They would like to only romantically be involved with the same sex
trait_homoromantic_info_2: I love people who are like me!
trait_heteroromantic_info: They would like to only romantically be involved with the different sex
trait_biromantic_info_2: Pulls sexes without needing to fuck any of them. What's your excuse?
trait_asexual_info: They do not desire coupling unlike most
trait_asexual_info_2: Coupling is so weird. It's soggy and time consuming.
trait_heterosexual_info: They prefer coupling with the opposite sex
trait_homosexual_info: They prefer coupling with the same sex
trait_homosexual_info_2: It ain't a choice, that much can be told.
trait_bisexual_info: They love coupling with both sexes
trait_faithful_info: They will never cheat on someone even if their romantic preference no longer matches their partner's sex
trait_faithful_info_2: It's the right thing to do.
trait_unfaithful_info: They will never commit to their relationship
trait_abroromantic_info: Their romantic orientation may change over time
trait_abroromantic_info_2: It'll be hard to commit to a lover.
trait_abrosexual_info: Their sexual orientation may change over time
culture_trait_homophobic_info: They despise others who get romantically or sexually involved with the same sex as themselves
culture_trait_heterophobic_info: They despise others who get romantically or sexually involved with a different sex from themselves
culture_trait_heterophobic_info_2: It's strange to think of two different sex people getting together.
culture_trait_incest_taboo_info: They are ashamed of their nature, and almost never commit incest
culture_trait_incest_taboo_info_2: Maybe, a right thing to do!
culture_trait_scar_of_incest_info: Civilizations feel that incest is a crucial part to their culture and will do it more often.
culture_trait_scar_of_incest_info_2: It is important to keep population counts high!
culture_trait_orientationless_info: The idea of orientations do not exist. They will only find lovers that they can breed with.
culture_trait_orientationless_info_2: What's a sexuality or romantic orientation? That's witchcraft thinking!
culture_trait_committed_info: They are commited to relationships and will never cheat or break up no matter how bad things get.
culture_trait_mature_dating_info: They will only date those that are in the same age stage as them.
culture_trait_mature_dating_info_2: No more 18 year olds dating 90 year olds!
culture_trait_sexual_expectations_info: Lovers may fulfill their sexual expectations with someone else without repercussions even if it is not their partner.
culture_trait_sexual_expectations_info_2: They can express their sexual being!
subspecies_trait_preservation_info: If their relative population count to their max limits are low, they will try to find people that they can reproduce with no matter what, disregarding what their culture or orientation may deem appropriate.
subspecies_trait_preservation_info_2: When the going gets tough, you do what you must to keep your legacies.
subspecies_trait_reproduction_same_sex_i: Two of the same sex are required to reproduce
subspecies_trait_incest_practice_info: Biologically related members may fall in love and couple
clan_trait_clanbound_isolation_info: Clan members wont ever marry those, who dont have their own clan.
clan_trait_clanbound_isolation_info_2: We cant let any plebeians rule our lands!
religion_trait_homomisos_info: They think anyone except heteros are heretics.
religion_trait_heteromisos_info: They think anyone except homos and bis are heretics.
religion_trait_heteromisos_info_2: Сallousness of soul promotes callousness of interests
religion_trait_unneutrumomisos_info: They think anyone except aromantics are heretics.
religion_trait_lust_punishment_info: They hate lecherous people in their society.
religion_trait_lust_recongition_info: They think that lust isnt really a sin.
tab_desc_tol: For all your romantic and sexual needs!
SlowOnLog Description: Slows the game automatically when logs happen when enabled. You can ignore this as a player.
Debug Description: Enables debug logs. Helpful for testing out a feature or needing to report information.
AllowCrossSpeciesLove Description: Whether different subspecies should be able to love each other.
MustBeSmart Description: Whether the two subspecies involved have to have all their brain functions in order to love each other.
MustBeXenophile Description: Whether the initiating lover has to be xenophile in order to love another subspecies unlike them. The receiving lover does NOT need to be xenophile, but they cannot be xenophobic.
